blogPost.title: Godot maintainer removes controversial satirical piece from documentation
blogPost.author: phreack

localize.title: Godot维护者从文档中删除了有争议的讽刺性文章。
Godot維護者從文檔中刪除了有爭議的諷刺性文章。

previous.excerpt:
Hello apes, I'm a former reporter at Bloomberg. I cannot divulge my name, but
ask me anything else and I will try to prove I'm not bullshitting.

Anyway, today we saw Bloomberg, CNBC, and Reuters simultaneously blast glowing
articles about how Plotkin made 20% in Feb. Every story came out at the…
previous.title: Melvin planted stories about their Feb performance

localize.title: 梅尔文种植的故事，他们2月的表现
localize.the_new_excerpt:
猩猩们好，我是彭博社的前记者。我不能透露我的名字，但是
问我其他的事情，我会努力证明我不是在胡说八道。

总之，今天我们看到彭博社、CNBC和路透社同时炮轰发光的。
关于Plotkin如何在2月赚了20%的文章，每篇报道都是在...
